TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi HttpEncoder extends System.Object

span.span: Provides encoding and decoding logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別包含編碼和解碼這類方法在類別中所使用的邏輯， ，和。The class contains encoding and decoding logic that is used by methods in classes such as , , and . 您可以繼承自類別並覆寫其行為，以自訂預設的編碼和解碼的 ASP.NET 行為。You can inherit from the class and override its behavior to customize the default encoding and decoding behavior of ASP.NET. 然後，您設定屬性類別，以設定您的自訂類別。You then set the property of the class to configure your custom class. 編碼和解碼的自訂類別衍生自可覆寫內建的 ASP.NET 編碼和解碼行為，或變更只會選取的項目。A custom class for encoding and decoding that derives from can override the built-in ASP.NET encoding and decoding behavior or change only selected aspects of it. 您可以在 ASP.NET 中來取代或補充下列編碼行為設定的自訂編碼類型：You can configure the custom encoding type for in ASP.NET to replace or supplement the following encoding behavior: - HTML 編碼HTML encoding - HTML 屬性編碼HTML attribute encoding - URL 編碼URL encoding - URL 路徑編碼URL path encoding - HTTP 標頭名稱和標頭值編碼方式HTTP header name and header value encoding 根據預設，ASP.NET 應用程式設定為使用輸入，針對所有輸出的編碼方式。By default, ASP.NET applications are configured to use the type for all output encoding. 下列範例從應用程式層級的 Web.config 檔案顯示如何類型會設定 ASP.NET 應用程式：The following example from an application-level Web.config file shows how the type is set for an ASP.NET application: `` 範例會設定中的組態設定類別來執行所有輸出應用程式中的編碼方式。The configuration setting in the example sets the class to perform all output encoding in the application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview.

para.span: 當您建立自訂編碼器類別並覆寫基底類別的基底方法時，衍生的編碼器可能會擲回任何覆寫方法的例外狀況。

span.span: When you create a custom encoder class and override the base methods of the base class, the derived encoder might throw an exception from any of the overridden methods.

para.span: 不過，在下列情況擲回例外狀況可能會導致非預期的行為，在 ASP.NET 中：

span.span: However, in the following cases throwing such an exception could lead to unexpected behavior in ASP.NET:

para.span: -如果 ASP.NET 呈現錯誤頁面，起因於未處理的例外狀況從自訂編碼器，ASP.NET 不會嘗試藉由呼叫自訂編碼器編碼其錯誤輸出。

span.span: - If ASP.NET is rendering an error page that is caused by an unhandled exception that was thrown from a custom encoder, ASP.NET does not attempt to encode its error output by calling into the custom encoder.

para.span: 這可避免遞迴錯誤狀況。

span.span: This avoids recursive error conditions.

para.span: -當 ASP.NET 傳送 HTTP 標頭至 IIS，ASP.NET 就會有任何未處理例外狀況的佈建。

span.span: - When ASP.NET is sending HTTP headers to IIS, ASP.NET has no provision for unhandled exceptions.

para.span: 因此，（如果組態設定允許此頁面，即可顯示），將會呈現標準的 ASP.NET 錯誤頁面。

span.span: Therefore, the standard ASP.NET error page will be rendered (if configuration settings allows this page to be displayed).

summary.span: 取得或設定將在應用程式中使用的 型別。

span.span: Gets or set the type that will be used in an application.

value.span: 將使用之編碼器/解碼器型別的參考。

span.span: A reference to the encoder/decoder type that will be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果衍生已在組態檔中，指定類型屬性會傳回自訂型別的參考。If a derived type is specified in the configuration file, the property returns a reference to the custom type. 不過，如果沒有自訂編碼器，屬性會傳回預設的 ASP.NET 的參考執行個體。However, if no custom encoder is used, the property returns a reference to the default ASP.NET instance. 屬性不是安全執行緒。The property is not thread-safe. 只能在應用程式中設定這個屬性`Application_Start`方法，因為`Application_Start`單一執行緒上執行。Set this property only in the application's `Application_Start` method, because `Application_Start` runs on a single thread.

exception.span: 指派給這個屬性的編碼器執行個體為 。

span.span: The encoder instance that is being assigned to this property is .

summary.span: 取得 ASP.NET 預設編碼器的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the default encoder for ASP.NET.
A reference to the default encoder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 常見的編碼問題是預設 ASP.NET行為會將空格轉換成"+"字元。A common encoding issue is that the default ASP.NET behavior converts spaces into the "+" character. 在過去，"+"字元已網際網路慣例更人類看得懂的方式編碼在 URL 中的空格字元。Historically, the "+" character has been an Internet convention for encoding space characters in a URL into a more human-readable manner. 不過，根據標準，空格字元應該為"%20"，而不是編碼為"+"字元。However, according to standards, the space character is supposed to be encoded as "%20" and instead of as the "+" character. ASP.NET 可讓您實作更多的標準符合編碼演算法。ASP.NET lets you implement a more standards compliant encoding algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void HeaderNameValueEncode (string headerName, string headerValue, out string encodedHeaderName, out string encodedHeaderValue);

protected public: virtual void HeaderNameValueEncode(System::String ^ headerName, System::String ^ headerValue, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % encodedHeaderName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % encodedHeaderValue);
abstract member HeaderNameValueEncode : string * string * * -> unit override this.HeaderNameValueEncode : string * string * * -> unit

param.name: headerName
param.span: 要編碼的 HTTP 標頭名稱。

span.span: The HTTP header name to encode.

param.name: headerValue
param.span: 要編碼的 HTTP 標頭值。

span.span: The HTTP header value to encode.

param.name: encodedHeaderName
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，傳回值會包含要用於 HTTP 標頭的編碼名稱。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the encoded name to use for an HTTP header.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

param.name: encodedHeaderValue
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，傳回值會包含要用於 HTTP 標頭的編碼值。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the encoded value to use for an HTTP header.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 將標頭名稱及值編碼為可當做 HTTP 標頭使用的字串。

span.span: Encodes a header name and value into a string that can be used as an HTTP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從輸入的字串`headerName`和`headerValue`參數，並將其編碼。The method takes input strings from the `headerName` and `headerValue` parameters and encodes them. 做為 out 參數，會傳回已編碼的值。The encoded values are returned as out parameters. 方法會使用下列邏輯來編碼標頭名稱和值：The method uses the following logic to encode header names and values: - 其 Unicode 值小於以外 9 的 ASCII 字元的 ASCII 字元 32 的所有字元都都轉換為格式的 URL 編碼`%NN`其中`N`字元表示的十六進位值。All characters whose Unicode value is less than ASCII character 32, except ASCII character 9, are URL-encoded into a format of `%NN` where the `N` characters represent hexadecimal values. - ASCII 字元 9 （水平定位字元） 不是 URL 編碼。ASCII character 9 (the horizontal tab character) is not URL-encoded. - 127 的 ASCII 字元編碼為`%7F`。ASCII character 127 is encoded as `%7F`. - 所有其他字元不被編碼。All other characters are not encoded. > [!NOTE] > 雖然這個方法可以用於 Unicode 值，它通常用於 ASCII 範圍內的值。Although this method can be used for Unicode values, it is typically used for values in the ASCII range. 預設實作方法會傳回值`headerValue`中`encodedHeaderValue`如果`headerValue`是`null`或為空字串。The default implementation of the method returns the value of `headerValue` in `encodedHeaderValue` if `headerValue` is `null` or is an empty string. 同樣地，預設實作會傳回的值`headerName`中`encodedHeaderName`如果`headerName`是`null`或為空字串。Similarly, the default implementation returns the value of `headerName` in `encodedHeaderName` if `headerName` is `null` or is an empty string.

span.span: The string to encode.

param.name: output
param.span: 要在其中寫入編碼值的文字寫入器。

span.span: The text writer to write the encoded value to.

summary.span: 將輸入值編碼為字串，此字串可插入至使用單或雙引號分隔的 HTML 屬性中。

span.span: Encodes an incoming value into a string that can be inserted into an HTML attribute that is delimited by using single or double quotation marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將字元編碼使用標準的 HTML 實體。The method encodes characters by using the standard HTML entities. 例如， `<` （左的角括號） 的編碼方式`<`並`\`（反斜線） 會編碼為`\`。For example, the `<` (left angle bracket) is encoded as `<` and the `\` (backslash) is encoded as `\`. 它會安全地使用單引號和雙引號括住屬性內。It is safe to use within single-quoted and double-quoted attributes. 值必須加上引號。The values must be quoted.

span.span: is .

span.span: The string to decode.

param.name: output
param.span: 要在其中寫入解碼值的文字寫入器。

span.span: The text writer to write the decoded value to.

summary.span: 將 HTML 編碼字串中的值解碼。

span.span: Decodes a value from an HTML-encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出 ASP.NET 解碼邏輯可以解碼的字元序列。The following table lists the character sequences that the ASP.NET decoding logic can decode. |字元順序Character sequence|規則Rule| |------------------------|----------| |`&#NNN;` （ASCII 字元的十進位碼）。`&#NNN;` (decimal codes for ASCII characters).|解碼成指定的 ASCII 字元。Decoded as the specified ASCII character. 字元順序開始 # 字元之後的第一個數字，並完成於分號。The character sequence starts at the first digit after the # character and finishes at the semicolon.| |`&#xZZ;` （ASCII 字元的十六進位碼）。`&#xZZ;` (hexadecimal codes for ASCII characters).|解碼成指定的 ASCII 字元。Decoded as the specified ASCII character. 編碼的格式指定的字元，而不是十進位值中使用十六進位字元。The encoded form specifies the character by using hexadecimal characters instead of a decimal value. 字元順序開始 # 字元之後的第一個數字，並完成於分號。The character sequence starts at the first digit after the # character and finishes at the semicolon.| |具名的 HTML 實體。Named HTML entities.|解碼為對等的 ASCII 字元。Decoded as the equivalent ASCII character.|

span.span: is .

summary.span: 將字串編碼為 HTML 編碼字串。

span.span: Encodes a string into an HTML-encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出 ASP.NET 的編碼邏輯可以解碼的字元序列。The following table lists the character sequences that the ASP.NET encoding logic can decode. |字元Character|編碼為Encoded as| |---------------|----------------| |`<` （左的角括號）`<` (left angle bracket)|`<`| |`>` （右角括號）`>` (right angle bracket)|`>`| |`"` （雙引號）`"` (double quotation marks)|`"`| |`&` （連字號）`&` (ampersand)|`&`| |`\` （反斜線）`\` (backslash)|`\`| |從 160 到 255 的 ASCII 字元ASCII characters from 160 to 255|`&#NNN;`其中`NNN`的三位數十進位字元碼`&#NNN;`, where `NNN` is the three-digit decimal character code| 如果您覆寫方法，您必須產生的安全性在雙引號或單引號的 HTML 屬性的輸出。If you override the method, you must produce output that is also safe within double-quoted or single-quoted HTML attributes. 這適用於剖析 Razor 引擎，其中標記和程式碼可以結合，例如\<標記 attr ="@value">。This accommodates parsing by the Razor engine, where markup and code can be combined, such as \. 此外，@ 運算子不是內容感知 Razor 引擎處理，因此它會呼叫而非。In addition, the @ operator is not context-aware when processed by the Razor engine, therefore it calls rather than .

span.span: is .

Encodes a string.
An encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks URL 編碼，可確定所有瀏覽器會正確傳輸 URL 字串中的文字。URL encoding makes sure that all browsers correctly transmit text in URL strings. 問號 （？）、 連字號 (&)、 斜線 （/） 和空格等字元可能會被截斷或某些瀏覽器損毀。Characters such as a question mark (?), ampersand (&), slash (/), and spaces might be truncated or corrupted by some browsers. 因此，您必須編碼這些字元。Therefore, these characters must be encoded.

span.span: An array of bytes to encode.

param.name: offset
param.span: 陣列中要開始編碼的位置。

span.span: The position in the array at which to begin encoding.

param.name: count
param.span: 陣列中要編碼之項目的數目。

span.span: The number of items in the array to encode.

summary.span: 將 URL 中不允許的字元陣列編碼為對等的十六進位字元實體。

span.span: Encodes an array of characters that are not allowed in a URL into a hexadecimal character-entity equivalent.
An array of encoded characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由數個 URL 編碼中的方法呼叫類別。The method is called by several URL encoding methods in the class. 方法進行 URL 編碼的任何不在集合的 ASCII 字元的字元數字會被視為安全的 URL。The method URL-encodes any character that is not in the set of ASCII characters that is considered to be URL-safe. 空格會被編碼為 ASCII 「`+"`字元。Spaces are encoded as the ASCII "`+"` character. URL 安全的 ASCII 字元包括 ASCII 字元 (A 到 Z 和 a 到 z)、 數字 (0 到 9)，以及某些標點符號。URL-safe ASCII characters include the ASCI characters (A to Z and a to z), numerals (0 to 9), and some punctuation marks. 下表列出會被視為安全的 URL ASCII 字元的標點符號。The following table lists the punctuation marks that are considered URL-safe ASCII characters. |字元Character|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |-|連字號Hyphen| |__|底線Underscore| |。.|句點 （點）Period (dot)| |!!|驚嘆號Exclamation mark| |*|星號 （star 認證）Asterisk (star)| |((|左括號Opening parenthesis| |))|右括號Closing parenthesis|

exception.span: 小於零或大於 陣列的長度。

span.span: is less than zero or greater than the length of the array.
-or-

exception.span: 小於零或 加上 大於 陣列的長度。

span.span: is less than zero or plus is greater than the length of the array.
is .

span.span: The string to encode.

summary.span: 編碼 URL 的子區段。

span.span: Encodes a subsection of a URL.
A URL-encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫 方法。The method is called by the method. 方法會執行下列步驟：The method performs the following steps: - 套用的編碼邏輯只有 URL （可在不含查詢字串） 的路徑部分的方法。Applies the encoding logic of the method to only the path part of the URL (which excludes the query string). 此方法會假設 URL 編碼為 utf-8 字串。The method assumes that the URL is encoded as a UTF-8 string. - 將非空格的編碼，以便產生編碼的字串中使用的前 128 個 ASCII 字元的子集。Encodes non-spaces so that only a subset of the first 128 ASCII characters is used in the resulting encoded string. 128 和更新版本，或 32 和更少的 Unicode 值的任何字元是 URL 編碼。Any characters at Unicode value 128 and greater, or 32 and less, are URL-encoded. - 將空格編碼為 %20。Encodes spaces as %20.
